TopicTitle: [KSP 1.12] I can see The Sun through Kerbin

Articles.Content: We can see the sun through the Kerbin, What a weird bug
I get that when I play stock without graphic mods. If I install Scatterer the sun then cannot be seen any more because of the voodoo that Scatterer do... so well

Yeah ; I used stock for this pics to show everyone it's a bug actually. Also this happens when i want to temp. Recycle the Scatterer to see the game in actual stock.
